metadata.title: Trendy Apparel Shop XXL Oversized Large Polyester Fishing Cap with Neck Flap
features: Full brim flap hat protects your face, head, ears, neck and back of your head from hot sun
Reflective tape on the flap will make sure you are visible at all times
Breathable Mesh side panels, 2 small air vents on the sides
Flexible, breathable, lightweight, packable and crushable material
One size fits most with an elastic adjustable
description: Trendy Apparel Shop XXL Oversized Large Polyester Fishing Cap with Neck Flap. 100% Polyester. Full brim flap hat protects your face, head, ears, neck and back of your head from hot sun. Reflective tape on the flap will make sure you are visible at all times. Breathable Mesh side panels, 2 small air vents on the sides. Flexible, breathable, lightweight, packable and crushable material. One size fits most with an elastic adjustable.
